articles.author: Emilee Speck
articles.title: See it: 'Halloween' comet vaporized after flying into Sun - Fox Weather
articles.description: A NASA and European spacecraft watched as a newly discovered comet dubbed the "Halloween comet" met its demise after its close approach to the Sun.
articles.content:
A NASA and European spacecraft watched as a newly discovered comet dubbed the "Halloween comet" met its demise after its close approach to the Sun.
